summary: This is a letter from American Express/DATAMARK Subpoena Compliance to the FBI acknowledging receipt of a subpoena for records related to an account (No. 07143MQR1000153482) and enclosing available documents. It details costs for production and requests payment.

events.title: Subpoena Payment Due Date
events.description: The due date for payment of $207.50 for the production of records in response to a subpoena.

events.title: Acknowledgment of Subpoena Receipt
events.description: American Express/DATAMARK sends a 2nd notice to the FBI acknowledging receipt of a subpoena for account records and enclosing available documents.

locations: 505 South Flagler Dr, Ste. 500 West Palm Beach, FL 33401-5923
keyFacts: The FBI subpoenaed American Express for records related to account number 07143MQR1000153482.
American Express/DATAMARK acknowledged the subpoena and provided available documents, noting statements are not generated for months with no account activity.
The cost for producing the records was $306.50, with a payment of $99.00 received, leaving a balance due of $207.50 as of the letter date.
The document is a '2ND Notice' regarding the subpoena, indicating prior communication about the matter.
The file reference (07143MQR1000153482) and case identifier (EFTA00104456) are provided, linking this to a specific investigative matter.
